item.title: Covac
item.description:
Am very glad a covid vaccine has a real chance.

“Little bottle of hope” for saving humans and creating prosperity for more (groan, yes, more humans are needed now eh).

That being said, I am actually very bitter going back to the new-normal, with a lot of skepticism.
